short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up a keyword, and see how many times it appears on the website and which HTML elements is used to present the keyword.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keywordbot makes it easy for you, to research a websites keywords.
When you search for a keyword, it will show you which HTML elements is used for the specific keyword and it will also highlight it on the website.
